comment.body: your peers might not have any uppit peers. CJDNS has a real chicken\egg problem that is really annoying as it seems they like to keep it difficult to use so its more of a closed thing a la usenet which is really disappointing because we seriously need meshnets going mainstream since it seems fcc etc are hellbent on destroying net neutrality

the  biggest problem with arch is those darn package manager commands. its ridiculous to do pacman -S "application" when pacman and "-S" have nothing to do with installing. why a simple pacman install "application" or just arch install or just install.
@Kaffie: oh, im not sure havent been active in the hyperboria sphere in a bit
